name: Chojo Gensho Test Demo
description: Sora is a young orphan, 12 years of age, who's entire family was killed by an evil spirit. Unfortunately, the spirit has managed to poison her! She has entered a coma, and must escape 6 "Dreamlands": Happyland, a amusement park, Spark Realm, a realm famous for bioluminescence, Spook Island, a haunted island, Techno District. a highly advanced district, Poptropolis, a city known for it's frequent visits by famous pop culture icons, and End Valley, not famous for anything really, to get back to reality.
